data.message: I LOVE inspirational stories!!!.....Stories of miracles, stories like this!!!....I have GOT to share this!!!

replies.message: We're glad to hear you enjoyed it, Bonnie! Thank you for your kind words and enthusiasm. -Kiara
This was so inspiring, there’s so many talented people around us everyday who needs a little encouragement to live their dreams.
People who do the cleaning are very important.  Just think how bad things would be if no one cleaned up after us in public places, hospitals, schools, businesses.
You will be interested in my story, about the day I fell off a 50 foot ladder. I was okay, the ladder was laying in the grass at that time, lucky for me.
Yes, me too. We need to know more about what positive, uplifting and motivational things people are doing to encourage.
Such a wonderful story & the fact that it's true &the Holidays are here it fits right in love 😍 it
I really like the people who attend the Sunrise group on Prince Avenue🙏🙏😍!!!!!
